::Firearm/Rex::

Firearm blinks, looking at Battera. "Um...."

This was one strange Predacon, most Predacons ussually didn't want to be 
killed. But where did she get the idea that he was going to kill her?

Firearm activates his comm-link. "Um, Rex," he says into it, "There's a 
Predacon female here that wants me to kill her. What do I do?"

"If you kill her," Rex's voice replies, "I'll scrap you and turn you into a 
food proccessor."

Firearm blinks again. This was confusing him, but he was easily confused. He 
looks at Battera. "Rex doesn't want me to kill you. Do you want to be killed?"
